title: Wealth Management Time
description: Wealth Management Time explains how to optimally manage the wealth in the global capital markets over the short and long time periods. The wealth creation, accumulation, multiplication and evaluation principles and techniques are clearly described, demystifying the Swiss investment banking secrets. The book will allow a prospective investor to learn the modern financial theories and practices to efficiently manage the wealth in the global capital markets over the short and long time periods. The main bookâ€™s objective is to educate a smart thinking successful investor with a complete set of wealth management skills to get the highest possible return-on-investment premiums during the financial capital investments in the highly-volatile global capital markets over the time.
author: Viktor O. Ledenyov
